#include<stdio.h>
#include<limits.h>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define M 1000000007
#define Max(a,b) (((a)>=(b))?(a):(b))
#define Min(a,b) (((a)<=(b))?(a):(b))
#define Abs(x) (((x)<0)?(-(x)):(x))

typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;

ll getnum()
{
	char ch;
	ll num=0;
	char negative=0;
	
	while(!isdigit(ch=gc()))
		if(ch=='-')
				negative =1 ;
	
	do
	{
		num=num*10+(ch-'0');
	
	}while(isdigit(ch=gc()));
	
	if(negative==0)
		return num;
	else
		return -num;

	
}

int f[501];

int compute(int n,int k,int m)
{
		if(f[n]!=-1)
			return f[n];
		
		f[n]=(compute(n-1,k,m+1)+ m*k-1)%n+1;
		
		return f[n];
		
}

int main()
{
	
		int t,i,n,k;
		
		scanf("%d",&t);
		
		while(t--)
		{
				scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
				
				for(i=0;i<=500;++i)
					f[i]=-1;
				
				f[1]=1;
				printf("%d\n",compute(n,k,1));
			
		}
			
		return 0;
	
	
}
